name: mltap
description: TAP producer and test runner for MarkLogic

scripts.test:
echo '

Running tests with mltap in MarkLogic
'; bin/mltap test/**.test.sjs && echo '

Running tests with tape in Node
'; tape test/**.test.sjs
scripts.config: gradle mlDeploy && mkdir -p ~/Library/MarkLogic/Modules/mltap; cp -R mltap.js test.js lib ~/Library/MarkLogic/Modules/mltap/
